channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Schumer says three of his New York offices were targeted with bomb threats
item.description: Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer says three of his New York offices were targeted with emailed bomb threats from an email address alleging the â€œ...

item.title: Heavy snow predicted for Northeast as Midwest still struggles with Thanksgiving weather snarls
item.description: Black ice, snow showers and fog are pestering post-holiday travelers in the Midwest, while the Northeast is gearing up for its first major snowstorm o...

item.title: Trump admin live updates: WH says Adm. Bradley gave order on 2nd drug boat strike
item.description: Karoline Leavitt said Adm. Mitch Bradley made the order for the second strike.

item.title: National Guard member shot in DC has shown positive signs, West Virginia governor says
Yankee Candle maker Newell Brands to close stores and cut 900 jobs
item.description: Newell Brands shares have sunk nearly 62% this year as the consumer products giant grapples with slowing growth.

item.title: Kids with smartphones by age 12 are at higher risk of health issues, study finds
item.description: Children and adolescents who own smartphones by age 12 have higher risks of depression, poor sleep and obesity, according to a new study.

item.title: White House says admiral ordered follow-on strike on alleged drug boat, insists attack was lawful
WATCH: Bear enjoys fresh snowfall at Chicago zoo
item.description: A resident bear at Brookfield Zoo Chicago took delight in the fresh snowfall over the weekend, rolling around in the snow.

item.title: Democrats begin congressional probe of Kash Patel's use of FBI Gulfstream jet
item.description: House Democrats allege Patel has used the FBI's Gulfstream jet for a "date night" in Tennessee and an outing with friends in Texas.

item.title: White House physician says Trump's imaging test results were 'perfectly normal'
item.description: The White House released the results of President Donald Trump's recent advanced imaging tests on Monday, describing them as "perfectly normal."

item.title: Gas prices dip below $3 per gallon, the lowest since 2021
item.description: The average price across the U.S. now stands at $2.95 per gallon, down 8.5 cents from a week ago, according to GasBuddy.

item.title: What we know about the vetting process of the National Guard shooting suspect
item.description: The shooting raised questions about whether the government missed any red flags about the alleged attacker, 29-year-old Afghan national Rahmanullah La...
